ComicInfo.Summary:
Emotional Ebola - Part One: The Red Hook is subjected to Doctor Hugo Girl's romeo-pathic treatments.
Chase the Lady, Chapter 12: Rachel tries to find Psykhe.
Murder Society, Chapter 3 - Friends in Low Places: Bronski tells his tale of sending a message.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 12: O'Connor and Hasan follow the glowing line out to Hell Gate.
Death Rides a Bullet: Chapter 04: The Black Sinister fights a Maniak device.
Kara Böcek, Chapter 2: The Black Beetle meets with his contact.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carla Speed McNeil,Dan Jolley,Dean Haspiel,Francesco Francavilla,John Nadeau,Kaare Kyle Andrews,Paul Levitz,Kaare Andrews,Dean Haspiel,Carla Speed McNeil,John Nadeau,Dan Jolley,Paul Levitz,Kaare Andrews,Francesco Francavilla
